ShinobiMatchCog

The base class that all cogs must inherit from.

setup(bot)

class shinobi_match.ShinobiMatchCog(bot)¶

Bases: discord.ext.commands.Cog

The base class that all cogs must inherit from.

A cog is a collection of commands, listeners, and optional state to help group commands together. More information on them can be found on the Cogs page.

When inheriting from this class, the options shown in CogMeta are equally valid here.

await match(self, ctx, opponent)¶

Play shinobi match with your friends using the characters from Naruto Verse

Steps > 1. Type {prefix}match @player_mention > 2. Then both player selects the character from their respection selection boxes > 3. Then starts the amazing match!

Rules > 1. You cannot repeat a move twice in a row > 2. You will have only 2 Special Moves to perform, so use wisely > 3. On timeout, by the default the user with high health value would be decalred as a winner > 4. Also you can perform healing operations twice in the whole game, so use the heal wisely.

Parameters

  • ctx (discord.ext.commands.Context) –

  • opponent (Union[discord.Member, lib.MemberID]) –
